p: Measles is a highly contagious and potentially fatal viral infection of the child and young adult caused by measles virus (MeV): a 15.9 kb enveloped, non-segmented, negative-stranded RNA virus belonging to the Paramyxoviridae family and the Morbillivirus genus [ 1]. This virus is transmitted from human to human via sputum and droplets from the respiratory tract [ 2].
